MENU.TITLE: D&D
MENU.DESCRIPTION: Select the menus to be displayed in ProseMirror.

CONDITIONTYPES.TITLE: Conditions
CONDITIONTYPES.HINT: Show condition types in the menu.

SAVES.TITLE: Saving Throws
SAVES.HINT: Show saving throws in the menu.

WEAPONMASTERIES.TITLE: Weapon Masteries
WEAPONMASTERIES.HINT: Show Weapon Masteries in the menu. (PHB required)

AREATARGETTYPES.TITLE: Area Target Types
AREATARGETTYPES.HINT: Show area target types in the menu.

ITEMPROPERTIES.TITLE: Spell Properties
ITEMPROPERTIES.HINT: Show spell properties in the menu.

DAMAGETYPES.TITLE: Damage Types
DAMAGETYPES.HINT: Show damage types in the menu.

CREATURETYPES.TITLE: Creature Types
CREATURETYPES.HINT: Show creature types in the menu.

FORMAT.TITLE: Enricher Format
FORMAT.HINT: Choose between short or long format for save and check enricher

MENU.TITLE: Menu Configuration
MENU.LABEL: Configure Menu Items
MENU.HINT: Configure which items appear in the D&D menu
